I

image - Variable in class main.Controller
 
image - Variable in class utilities.Image
 
Image - Class in utilities
The Image class is used to represent an Image (or frame if you will) that gets projected on the screen by the renderer and is seen by the Camera.
Image(int, int) - Constructor for class utilities.Image
The Image constructor gets a width and height as parameter and creates an Image with the specified width and height.
initializeCamera() - Method in class main.Controller
The initializeCamera method creates a new Camera object which takes the Scene's static ORIGIN variable as it's position, a Vector3D target (lookAt), a Vector3D targetUpGuide, a fieldOfView and an aspectRatio which are both specified in the Options object.
initializeImage() - Method in class main.Controller
The private initialize Image method creates a new Image object with the width and height specified in the Options object as its constructor arguments.
initializeRenderer() - Method in class main.Controller
A method which initializes an Image object, a Scene object and a Camera object, so that a Renderer object can be created with a Camera and Scene object that it needs as constructor arguments.
initializeScene() - Method in class main.Controller
The initializeScene method creates a new Scene object after which it calls the Scene's add method which accepts any object that extends the abstract SceneObject class.
intensify(float) - Method in class utilities.Color
The intensify method multiplies the float value with the colors fields to intensify the objects color.
intensity - Variable in class utilities.Light
 
intersects(Ray) - Method in class geometries.Plane
Override abstract parent class' intersects method to see if the ray intersects with the Plane geometry.
intersects(Ray) - Method in class geometries.Shape
Abstract intersects method that need to be overridden by all the geometries that extend this class.
intersects(Ray) - Method in class geometries.Sphere
Override abstract parent class' intersects method to see if the ray intersects with the Sphere geometry.
isReflective() - Method in class geometries.Shape
